question: What was the theme of the fourth edition of the Internet of Things (IoT) India Congress 2019 held in Bengaluru, Karnataka in August 2019?
explanation: The fourth edition of India’s largest confluence of digital-technology stakeholders, the Internet of Things (IoT) India Congress 2019 concluded its two-day event in Bengaluru, Karnataka in August 2019. The IoT India Congress is the platform of platforms for the Internet of Things. This year’s theme was ‘Mainstreaming the Internet of Things’.
